getAdmin().notice: gives the current administrator of this contract.

isMetaTransactionProcessor(address).notice: check whether address `who` is given meta-transaction execution rights.

mintFor(address,uint40,bytes32,uint32,ad.notice: mint common Asset token by paying the Sand fee

mintMultipleFor(address,uint40,bytes32,u.notice: mint multiple common Asset tokena by paying the Sand fee

setFeePerCopy(uint256).notice: set the fee in Sand for each common Asset copies

setFeeReceiver(address).notice: set the receiver of the proceeds

setMetaTransactionProcessor(address,bool.notice: Enable or disable the ability of `metaTransactionProcessor` to perform meta-tx (metaTransactionProcessor rights).
